middle_cards.name: Homestead
middle_cards.motd: Does this mean you beat the Oregon Trail?
middle_cards.description: This modpack has a super cozy vibe, features a custom world, fancy wildlife, pretty shaders, and a quest system (Its not forced down your throat tho). It is overall just a really nice environment to play Minecraft in, and it seems like it would be fun!
middle_cards.pack-desc: Homestead is a cozy Vanilla+ Minecraft modpack built for explorers, builders, and survivors. Whether you prefer peaceful building or daring adventures, Homestead provides a handcrafted experience with custom quests, structures, mobs, and items â€” all designed to keep you playing far beyond the usual two-week phase.

middle_cards.name: Spooktastic
middle_cards.motd: I shit myself while playing this
middle_cards.description: This modpack is all about the spooks and scares! It is story based, featuring a quest system that everyone can work cooperatively through. Every few nights, the difficulty is cranked to 10, when surviving even normal nights on your own is already unlikely. Because of this, the day/night cycle is extended, giving you plenty of time to prepare. Additionally, this pack has built-in shaders which makes it impossible to navigate at night unless you brought  your lantern.
middle_cards.pack-desc: Made for CO-OP. A unique, immersive and difficult horror modpack with a campaign and tons of custom content.

bottom_cards.name: All The Mods 9
bottom_cards.description: All the mods in one server! Can you handle it? dare you try? Join us and find out! This was written by Github Copilot.
bottom_cards.pack-desc: ATM9 has over 400 mods loaded and countless quests and a built in proper endgame. Can you craft the ATM Star? Do you dare take on the Gregstar?

bottom_cards.name: Minecraft Chocolate Edition
bottom_cards.description: Minecraft but chocolate and not vanilla
bottom_cards.pack-desc: This modpack is not Vanilla Plus, or Vanilla 2, or any other fancy term- it's Chocolate. Straight up. This modpack is Minecraft if it had Terraria devs, Minecraft with direction, so you can play without the urge to ditch your survival world after getting iron.
